title: docker-issue
description:
‚óè Both issues are now fixed:

  1. Healthcheck issue: Changed wget --spider (HEAD request) to wget -O /dev/null (GET request) in docker-compose.yml:91
  2. Simulator API URL issue: Updated the Dockerfile CMD to use the API_URL environment variable in python-simulator/Dockerfile:21

  The simulator now runs successfully with 100% success rate:
  - 93,481 points sent
  - 93,481 successful
  - 0 errors
  - Average throughput: 1469 pts/sec
